another banger adventure indie game from the annapurna collection looks and plays great its super intuitive the game manages to show you everything without any explicit tutorials a masterpiece across the board  art sound level design

a really good puzzle game although perhaps a bit overhyped the strong parts are the vibes and the fact that it needs no tutorial  everything is intuitive and slowly taught through simpler puzzles on the flip side of the coin all that teaching through easy puzzles means most of the game is easy puzzles as the game ends it feels like it didnt really explore the mechanics that much i could have easily gone for a couple more levels that were using the mechanics to the fullest potential

a very solid and inventive little puzzle game that while having some very fun and creative ideas gets a bit tedious towards the tail end the beginnings quite easy and things dont get truly engaging till youre an hour and a half to two hours in and the whole thing is roughly 45 hours long with its last hour being a bit of a drag with how much you gotta backtrack still again theres some really clever stuff in here and its worth a playthrough  score710
great game
really fun puzzle game none of the puzzles are terribly difficult but plenty of aha moments only negative is its short i finished in 5 hours total play time playing at a relaxed pace
beautiful locales superb use of volumetric lighting and very relaxing sound design and music the puzzles are middle of the road for complexity
so many balls it broke my brain amazing game

shortncozy game with an accent on visual spectacle and organicallyflowing nottoohard puzzles   perfect if you want to enjoy the feeling of cogs meshing well together without overheating your brain on a fine evening makes absolutely zero sense storywise but come on its a puzzle game so who cares  might be a bit overpriced tho get it on a sale

this game is beautiful so lovingly designed the puzzles are tricky and the boss fights are challenging but even when i had to retry them 10 times over i did not get frustrated because i enjoyed the mechanics nothing ever felt like a slog the puzzles are exactly the level of tricky where if i cant figure one out immediately and take a break from the game i always find something new that i missed when i come back i wish i could play another 10h of this
really loved this game the puzzles the music the story  atmosphere are all incredibly compelling
lovely vibe based puzzle adventure game reminiscent of limbo and inside i absolutely loved every moment
